pageContent:
Nishallya Oppla Ravikumar 
 
Address: No.25, Panthadi 4th street, Mahal main, Madurai, Tamil Nadu 
Phone: +918056201934 (WhatsApp call preferable) 
Email: nishallinfy@gmail.com 
Summary 
Appian BPM tool | Full stack developer 
 
Dedicated and experienced Full Stack Developer with a focus on Appian BPM tool. Appian Certified Lead 
Developer with 8 years of comprehensive expertise. Proficient in managing teams, designing scalable 
solutions, and ensuring customer satisfaction. 
Experience 
 
PwC Pvt. Ltd. | Bangalore | Karnataka 
Senior Associate 2 | 02/2023 – 07/2023 
 
Project: Abbvie (Pharmaceutical Industry) | Environment: Appian 23.1 
 
-Led a team of 12 through sprint planning to successful delivery. 
-Prepared detailed technical documentation, ensuring scalable solutions aligned with customer requirements. 
-Implemented Effective Appian solutions and provided subject matter expertise.

-Prepared detailed technical documentation, ensuring scalable solutions aligned with customer requirements. 
-Implemented Effective Appian solutions and provided subject matter expertise. 
-Facilitated requirement gathering for business users and maintained meticulous technical documentation. 
-Reported work progress and resolved code bugs. 
 
Hexaware Technologies | Tamil Nadu, Chennai 
Technical Lead | 01/2021 – 02/2023 
 
Project: Fac Digital Trading – AIG (American Insurance Group) | Environment: Appian v 22.3 
 
-Collaborated closely with clients in sprint planning sessions, enhancing project understanding. 
-Demonstrated expertise in developing Process models, Interfaces, Reports, Records, and Integrations. 
-Recognized twice for outstanding performance by both clients and internal teams. 
-Proficient in MySQL Workbench for database management. 
 
BNP Paribas | Tamil Nadu, Chennai  
Software Engineer | 08/2018 - 01/2021

-Proficient in MySQL Workbench for database management. 
 
BNP Paribas | Tamil Nadu, Chennai  
Software Engineer | 08/2018 - 01/2021 
Project: Commercial Product On-boarding | Environment: Appian v 20.2 
- Built and test complete process flow of 12-15 products 
- Exception handling using admin work flow 
- Have experience in integration of 'Treasury now' and 'Payment hub' 
- Improved client on-boarding and readiness to expedite account revenue capture

- Enabled best-of-class stewardship from support for our client and sales team members 
- Updated CMPO (Cash Management Product On-boarding) to support the migration to CMOS for CMPO integration 
- Generation of PDF and Word File of customer details along with every process flow 
- Enhancement of Stored Procedure to calculate project revenue of a Bank 
Infosys | Tamil Nadu, Chennai  
Senior Systems Engineer | 08/2015 - 08/2018 
Project: Department of Lands (DoL) | Environment: Appian v17.2 1 
-Creation of process model, SAIL forms, query rules, entities and CDTs using Appian platform. 
-Predominantly deals with the creation of an application to the DoL for land administration and other functions of 
western Australia’s Crown Land estate. 
-Design of new functionalities using smart services provided by Appian. 
-Fixed & closed issues in LIRA and enhancements were done with respect to new requirements from business.

-Design of new functionalities using smart services provided by Appian. 
-Fixed & closed issues in LIRA and enhancements were done with respect to new requirements from business. 
-Have been part of unit & functional testing in dev & test environments of individual user stories and after integration with process 
flow. 
 
-Creation of an application to the Client SVM (United states) for fumigation administration. 
-Automated Appian Testing using FitNesse Tool 
-It provides efficient pest control services that meet customer ‘s needs using four stages- pull cap, up, down, clear. 
-Have been part of unit & functional testing in dev & test environments of individual user stories and after integration with process 
flow. 
 
 
Technologies: Appian BPM, SQL, Python, CSS, JIRA, HTML5, Agile, Adobe Illustrator, JQuery, Oracle. 
Soft Skills: Team Leadership, Agile Methodologies, Effective Communication, Problem Solving.

Technologies: Appian BPM, SQL, Python, CSS, JIRA, HTML5, Agile, Adobe Illustrator, JQuery, Oracle. 
Soft Skills: Team Leadership, Agile Methodologies, Effective Communication, Problem Solving. 
 
 
 
I hereby declare that the information provided above is true to the best of my knowledge and belief. I 
understand that any false statements or omissions may result in disqualification from employment or 
termination if employed.
